body.json: {    "method": "AddClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "acceptEula": true,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "AddLdapClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "username": "<Cluster Admin Full Distinguished Name or Group Name from LDAP Server>",        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "acceptEula": true,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "clusterAdminID": <Cluster Admin ID>,        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "password": "<Optional Cluster Admin Password>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "CreateClusterInterfacePreference",    "params": {        "name": "<Name for the New Preference>",        "value": "<Value for the New Preference>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "DeleteClusterInterfacePreference",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of the Preference to be Deleted>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "DeleteKeyProviderKmip",    "params": {        "keyProviderID": <ID of the Key Provider to be Deleted>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "DeleteKeyServerKmip",    "params": {        "keyServerID": <ID of the Key Server to be Deleted>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "GetKeyProviderKmip",    "params": {      "keyProviderID": <ID of the Key Provider to Return>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "GetKeyServerKmip",    "params": {      "keyServerID": <ID of the Key Server to Return>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ListKeyProvidersKmip",    "params": {      "keyProviderIsActive": <Optional Boolean True or False>,      "kmipKeyProviderHasServerAssigned": <Optional Boolean True or False>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ListKeyServersKmip",    "params": {      "keyProviderID": <Optional Key Provider ID>,      "kmipAssignedProviderIsActive": <Optional Boolean True or False>,      "kmipHasProviderAssigned": <Optional Boolean True or False>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyClusterFullThreshold",    "params": {        "stage2AwareThreshold": <Number of Nodes of Capacity Remaining Before Warning>,        "stage3BlockThresholdPercent": <Percentage of Block Storage Usage Below the Error Threshold Before Warning>,        "maxMetadataOverProvisionFactor": <Optional Metadata Multiplier Times Actual Space Available>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "ModifyClusterInterfacePreference",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of the Preference to Modify>",        "value": "<New Value for the Preference>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetLoginBanner",    "params": {        "banner": "<Optional login/terms of use banner message>",        "enabled": <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetNtpInfo",    "params": {        "servers": [<CSV List of Quoted NTP Servers>],        "broadcastclient": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "SetRemoteLoggingHosts",    "params": {        "remoteHosts": [            {                "host": "<IP Address of Remote Logging Host>",                "port": <Remote Logging Port Number>            },            {                "host": "<Optional IP Address of Remote Logging Host>",                "port": <Optional Remote Logging Port Number>            }        ]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "SetSnmpInfo",    "params": {        "networks": [            {                "community": "<SNMP Community String>",                "access": "<Access Level>",                "network": "<A.B.C.D Network Address>",                "cidr": <Integer Representation of CIDR Netmask>            },            {                "<Optional Additional SNMP Network Object>"            }        ],        "usmUsers": [            {                "access": "<Access Level>",                "name": "<SNMP User Name>",                "passphrase": "<SNMP User Passphrase>",                "password": "<SNMP User Password>",                "secLevel": "<Security Level>"            }        ],        "enabled": <Boolean true or false>,        "snmpV3Enabled": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "Shutdown",    "params": {        "nodes": [<CSV List of Node IDs>],        "option": "<Either halt or restart>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "TestKeyProviderKmip",    "params": {      "keyProviderID": <ID of the Key Provider to Test>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "TestKeyServerKmip",    "params": {      "keyServerID": <ID of the Key Server to Test>    },    "id": 1}

{
    "method": "CreateCluster",
    "params": {
        "acceptEula": true,
        "mvip": "<Cluster MVIP>",
        "svip": "<Cluster SVIP>",
        "repCount": 2,
        "enableSoftwareEncryptionAtRest": <Optional boolean true or false>,
        "orderNumber": "<Optional alphanumeric string required for eSDS clusters>",
        "serialNumber": "<Optional alphanumeric string required for eSDS clusters>",
        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",
        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",
        "nodes": [<CSV List of Quoted Node Storage IP Addresses>],
        "attributes": {}
    },
    "id": 1
}
{    "method": "RemoveDrives",    "params": {        "drives": [<CSV List of Drive IDs>],        "forceDuringBinSync": <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{
    "method": "EnableLdapAuthentication",
    "params": {
        "authType": "SearchAndBind",
        "groupSearchBaseDN": "<Base Distinguished Name for Group Search>",
        "groupSearchType": "ActiveDirectory",
        "searchBindDN": "<Read Only LDAP Account Distinguished Name>",
        "searchBindPassword": "<Read Only LDAP Account Password>",
        "userSearchBaseDN": "<Base Distinguished Name for User Search>",
        "userSearchFilter": "(&(objectClass=person)(sAMAccountName=%USERNAME%))",
        "serverURIs": [
            "<LDAP Server 1 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 2 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 3 - IP Address>",
            "<LDAP Server 4 - IP Address>"
        ]
    },
    "id": 1
}

{    "method": "CreateClusterSupportBundle",    "params": {        "mvip": "<MVIP of Cluster - Either mvip or nodes is required>",        "nodes": "<CSV List of Node IP Addresses>",        "username": "<Cluster Admin Username>",        "password": "<Cluster Admin Password>",        "allowIncomplete": <Optional Boolean true or false>,        "bundleName": "<Optional Custom name for the support bundle>",        "extraArgs": "<Optional additional arguments>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "AddIdpClusterAdmin",    "params": {        "username": "<key=value pair to match with information from IdP>",        "access": [<CSV list of quoted access levels or "administrator" for all>],        "acceptEula": true,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "AddNodes",    "params": {        "pendingNodes": [<CSV List of Pending Node IDs>],        "autoInstall" : <Optional boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CheckPingOnVlan",    "params": {        "hosts": "<CSV String of IP Addresses>",        "interface": "<Existing interface on which the temporary vlan interface is created>",        "sourceAddressV4": "<Source IPv4 Address - v4 or v6 Address is Required>",        "sourceAddressV6": "<Source IPv6 Address - v4 or v6 Address is Required>",        "virtualNetworkTag": "<VLAN on which pings will be tested>"    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "CheckProposedCluster",    "params": {        "nodes": [<List of node storage IPs that will comprise the proposed cluster>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ControlPower",    "params": {        "action": "<Either Halt or Restart>",        "wakeupDelay": <Delay in seconds to wait for power on.  Only usable with Halt option>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateSupportBundle",    "params": {        "bundleName": "<Optional custom name for the support bundle>",        "extraArgs": "<Optional additional arguments>",        "timeoutSec": <Optional timeout for the support bundle process in seconds>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ResetNode",    "params": {        "force": true,        "build": "<Optional URL of image to build>",        "options": {<Optional options to pass to the reset operation>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetClusterConfig",    "params": {        "cluster": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetConfig",    "params": {        "config": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "SetNetworkConfig",    "params": {        "network": {<JSON Object Indicating Parameters to be Changed>}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "TestAddressAvailability",    "params": {        "interface": "<Target network interface>",        "address": "<IP address to be tested>",        "virtualNetworkTag": <Optional VLAN tag>,        "timeout": <Optional timeout in seconds, default is 5>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "TestConnectEnsemble",    "params": {        "ensemble": "<Optional CSV list of Node Cluster IPs>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "TestPing",    "params": {        "attempts": <Number of Pings to Attempt>,        "hosts": "<CSV List of IP Addresses>",        "totalTimeoutSec": <Test Timeout in Sec>,        "packetSize": <Ping Packet Size in Bytes>,        "pingTimeoutMSec": <Per Ping Timeout in MSec>,        "prohibitFragmentation": <Boolean true or false to set the DF flag>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "CancelClone",    "params": {        "cloneID": <Clone ID for the Ongoing Clone Process>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "CancelGroupClone",    "params": {        "groupCloneID": <Group Clone ID for the Ongoing Group Clone Process>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CloneMultipleVolumes",    "params": {        "volumes": [            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>                "name": "<Optional Clone Volume Name>",                "access": "<Optional Clone Volume Access Level>",                "newAccountID": "<Optional New Account ID>",                "newSize": "<Optional New Clone Volume Size in Bytes>",                "attributes": {}            },            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>            },            {                "volumeID": <Volume ID>            }        ],        "access": "<Optional Clone Volume Access Level>",        "groupSnapshotID": <Optional Group Snapshot to be used as the source for the clone>,        "newAccountID": <Optional ID of the Account for the new clone volumes>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CloneVolume",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "name": "<Name of New Cloned Volume>",        "newAccountID": <Optional New Account ID>,        "newSize": <Optional New Size in Bytes>,        "access": "<Optional Access Level>",        "snapshotID": <Optional ID of the Snapshot to be Used>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CopyVolume",    "params": {        "dstVolumeID": <VolumeID of the Volume to Overwrite>,        "volumeID": <VolumeID of the volume to be read from>,        "snapshotID": <Optional ID of the Snapshot to use as Source of the Copy>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateQoSPolicy",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of QoS Policy>",        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Burst IOPS>        }    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "CreateStorageContainer",    "params": {        "name": "<Name of new Storage Container>",        "accountID": <Optional ID of Account to Assign to Storage Container>,        "initiatorSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Initiator>",        "targetSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Target>"    },    "id": 1}

{
    "method": "CreateVolume",
    "params": {
        "name": "<Volume Name>",
        "accountID": <Account ID>,
        "totalSize": <Volume Size in Bytes>,
        "enable512e": <Boolean true or false>,
    "access": "<Optional the access mode for the volume. Only 'snapMirrorTarget' is allowed>",
        "attributes": {},
        "qos": {
            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,
            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,
            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>,
            "burstTime": 60
        },
        "qosPolicyID": "<Optional QoS Policy ID>",
        "associateWithQoSPolicy": <Optional Boolean true or false>,
    "enableSnapMirrorReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,
        "fifoSize": "<Optional maximum number of FIFO (First-In-First-Out) snapshots supported by the volume. Note that FIFO and non-FIFO snapshots both use the same pool of available snapshot slots on a volume. Use this option to limit FIFO snapshot consumption of the available snapshot slots. If unspecified, a default value of 24 will be used>",
        "minFifoSize": "<Optional number of snapshot slots that are reserved for only FIFO (First-In-First-Out) snapshots. Since FIFO and non-FIFO snapshots share the same pool, the 'minFifoSize' reduces the total number of possible non-FIFO snapshots by the same amount. If unspecified, a default value of 0 will be used>",
    },
    "id": 1
}

{    "method": "CreateVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "name": "<Volume Access Group Name>",        "initiators": [<CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>],        "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs>],        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "DeleteStorageContainers",    "params": {        "storageContainerIDs": [<CSV List of Storage Container IDs to Delete>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "DeleteVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete Initator Objects When Removed from Volume Access Group: Boolean true or false>,        "force": <Boolean true or false>    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "DeleteVolumes",    "params": {        "volumeIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Volume IDs>],        "accountIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Account IDs: All Volumes from These Accounts are Deleted>],        "volumeAccessGroupIDs": [<Optional CSV List of Volume Access Group IDs: all Volumes from These Volume Access Groups are Deleted>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyBackupTarget",    "params": {        "backupTargetID": <Backup Target ID>,        "name": "<Optional New Backup Target Name>",        "attributes": {<Optional Updated Backup Target Parameters>}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyQoSPolicy",    "params": {      "qosPolicyID": <QoS Policy ID>,        "name": "<Optional Name of QoS Policy>",        "qos": {            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>        }    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyStorageContainer",    "params": {        "storageContainerID": <Storage Container ID>,        "initiatorSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Initiator>",        "targetSecret": "<Optional CHAP Secret for Target>"                 }    },    "id": 1}

{
    "method": "ModifyVolume",
    "params": {
        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,
        "accountID": <Optional New Account ID for Volume>,
        "totalSize": <Optional New Volume Size in Bytes>,
        "setCreateTime": "<Optional Boolean true or false. Set New Creation Time for the Volume>",
        "createTime": "<Optional New Creation Time for the Volume if setCreateTime is true>",
        "access": {
      "readOnly": "<Optional Only read operations allowed>",
      "readWrite": "<Optional Read and writes are allowed>",
      "locked": "<Optional No reads or writes are allowed. if not specified, the access value does not change>",
      "replicationTarget": "<Optional Identify a volume as the target volume for a paired set of volumes. If the volume is not paired, the access status is locked. If a value is not specified, the access value does not change>",
      "snapMirrorTarget": "<Optional Identify a volume as the target volume for SnapMirror replicatio>"
    },
        "qos": {
            "minIOPS": <Optional Minimum IOPS>,
            "maxIOPS": <Optional Maximum IOPS>,
            "burstIOPS": <Optional Burst IOPS>,
            "burstTime": 60
        },
    "mode": {
            "sync":  "<Optional Waits for system to ackowledge hat data is stored on source before writing to the target>",
            "async": "<Optional Does not wait for data transmission ackowledgment from the source to begin writing data to the target>"
        },
        "qosPolicyID": <Optional QoS Policy ID>,
        "associateWithQoSPolicy": "<Optional Boolean true or false. If 'true', associate the volume with the QoS policy specified in the QoSPolicyID parameter. If 'false', do not assosciate the volume with the QoS policy specified in the QoSPolicyID parameter. When 'false', any existing policy association is removed regardless of whether you specify a QoS policy in the 'qosPolicyID' parameter>",
        "enableSnapMirrorReplication": <Optional Boolean true or false>,
        "fifoSize": "<Optional maximum number of FIFO (First-In-First-Out) snapshots supported by the volume. Note that FICO and non-FICO snapshots both use the same pool of available snapshot slots on a volume. Use this option to limit FIFO snapshot consumption of the available snapshot slots. You cannot modify this value to be less than the current FIFO snapshot count>",
    "minFifoSize": "<Optional number of snapshot slots that are reserved for only FIFO (First-In-First-Out) snapshots. Since FIFO and non-FIFO snapshots share the same pool, the 'minFifoSize' reduces the total number of possible non-FIFO snapshots by the same amount. You cannot modify this value so that it conflicts  with the current non-FIFO snapshot count>",
    "attributes": {},
    },
    "id": 1
}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "name": "<Optional Volume Access Group Name>",        "initiators": [            <CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>        ],        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete initiator objects After Removal from Volume Access Group: true or false>,        "volumes": [            <Optional CSV List of Volume IDs>        ],        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumeAccessGroupLunAssignments",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "lunAssignments": [            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> },            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> },            { "volumeID": <Volume ID>, "lun": <LUN ID> }        ]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "ModifyVolumePair",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "pausedManual": <Boolean true or false>,        "mode": "<Volume Replication Mode: Async, Sync, or SnapshotsOnly>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "PurgeDeletedVolumes",    "params": {        "volumeIDs": [<Optional List of Volume IDs to Purge>],        "accountIDs": [<Optional List of Account IDs to Purge From>],        "volumeAccessGroupIDs": [<Optional list of Volume Access Group IDs to Purge From>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "RemoveInitiatorsFromVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "initiators": [<CSV List of Initiator IDs (integers) or Quoted IQNs or WWPNs (strings, deprecated)>],        "deleteOrphanInitiators": <Delete initiator objects After Removal from Volume Access Group: true or false>    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "RemoveVolumesFromVolumeAccessGroup",    "params": {        "volumeAccessGroupID": <Volume Access Group ID>,        "volumes": [<CSV List of Volume IDs>]    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "RollbackToGroupSnapshot",    "params": {        "groupSnapshotID": <Group Snapshot ID>,        "name": "<Optional Group Snapshot Name if Saving State>",        "saveCurrentState": <Boolean true or false>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "RollbackToSnapshot",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "snapshotID": <Snapshot ID>,        "name": "<Optional Name for the Snapshot if Saving State>",        "saveCurrentState": <Boolean true or false>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "StartBulkVolumeRead",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "format": "<Either native or uncompressed>",        "snapshotID": <Snapshot ID>,        "script": "<Optional script name>",        "scriptParameters": <JSON Formatted Script Parameters>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "StartBulkVolumeWrite",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "format": "<Either native or uncompressed>",        "script": "<Optional script name>",        "scriptParameters": <JSON Formatted Script Parameters>,        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
{    "method": "StartVolumePairing",    "params": {        "volumeID": <Volume ID>,        "mode": "<Volume Replication Mode: Async, Sync, or SnapshotsOnly>"    },    "id": 1}

{    "method": "UpdateBulkVolumeStatus",    "params": {        "key": "<Bulk Volume Job Key>",        "status": "<Bulk Volume Job Status>",        "percentComplete": "<Optional Percent Complete>",        "message": "<Bulk Volume Job Status Message>",        "attributes": {}    },    "id": 1}
